articles.content:
JESSIE J has broken down in tears over the "unfair" death of her close friend Jamal Edwards.
The pop star - who met Jamal when she was 17 - says she "can't stop" herself from crying as she struggles… [+2269 chars]

articles.title: EastEnders' actor 'haunted' by sexual abuse at hands of backup singer for Shirley Bassey - The Mirror
articles.description: Soap actor Stuart Antony, 34, who played a friend of Shane Richie's Alfie Moon in EastEnders, has spoken out after being abused hundreds of times by his attacker, Billy Nutt, in a five-year ordeal
articles.content:
An EastEnders actor has described being abused hundreds of times at the hands of a showbiz paedophile who sang with Shirley Bassey.
Courageous Stuart Antony, 34, who played a friend of Shane Richie'… [+4503 chars]

articles.author: Kirsty McKenzie
articles.title: Rod Stewart spotted serving pints at Glasgow pub following Old Firm Game - Glasgow Live
articles.description: Punters were left amazed last night (Sunday, May 1) when the chart-topper took over service at the Finnieston bar and started serving pints following the Celtic and Rangers match.
articles.content:
Rod Stewart delighted punters when he got behind the bar to pull pints at a Glasgow pub following the Old Firm match.
The rocker paid a surprise visit to the The Dirty Duchess in Argyle Street yeste… [+849 chars]

articles.title: Dirty Dancing’s Jennifer Grey says seeing her botched nose job was like ‘a bad hallucinogenic trip’ - The Independent
articles.description: She said that after the procedure, ‘in the world’s eyes, I was no longer me’
articles.content:
